markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Bullying Staff](/Feats.aspx?ID=1194) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 75</row>

**Archetype** [Staff Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=37)

**Prerequisites**
[Staff Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1193)

**Requirements**
You are wielding your staff.

</column>

---

You can attempt to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) creatures up to two sizes larger than you. If you have master proficiency with your staff, you can attempt to Shove or Trip creatures up to three sizes larger than you.
name: Bullying Staff
